EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2019-01-10
EmailTemplate.subject: Early Adoption Plus Scale is a Winning Combo for Pivotal and Accenture
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
January 11,Â 2019 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/videos/early-adoption-plus-scale-is-a-winning-combo-for-pivotal-and-accenture?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Early Adoption Plus Scale is a Winning Combo for Pivotal and Accenture Ryan Johnson, Associate Director at Accenture, chats with Jeff Kelly on the Pivotal Stories stage at SpringOne Platform 2018. Watch Now <[[https://content.pivotal.io/videos/early-adoption-plus-scale-is-a-winning-combo-for-pivotal-and-accenture?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://youtu.be/q3tTovgwHVs]]> A Digital Transformation Story within the World's Largest Bureaucracy Adam Furtado, Chief Product Officer at the U.S. Air Force deep dives into how they're getting more agile. Check it Out <[[https://youtu.be/q3tTovgwHVs]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/blog/run-net-framework-apps-on-a-modern-platform-with-an-smb-network-share-steeltoe-makes-it-easy?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Want to Run .NET Framework Apps on a Modern Platform with an SMB Network Share? Learn how easy it is to implement net use within a cloud-native .NET microservice. Steeltoe Makes It Easy <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/run-net-framework-apps-on-a-modern-platform-with-an-smb-network-share-steeltoe-makes-it-easy?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://springonetour.io/?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/scaling-digital-transformation-in-the-enterprise-with-pivotal-and-accenture?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Scaling Digital Transformation in the Enterprise with Pivotal and Accenture This week, Mik Freedman and Joey Sabani, members of our Agile Practice Leadership Enablement team, join Jeff and Dormain to talk about Pivotal's joint work with Accenture, the global consulting firm. Listen In <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/scaling-digital-transformation-in-the-enterprise-with-pivotal-and-accenture?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/hack-your-culture-to-drive-quality-and-devops-success?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Hack Your Culture to Drive Quality and DevOps Success Why application leaders responsible for delivering digital business applications must hack their development culture to enable modern quality practices and DevOps success. Check out the White paper <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/hack-your-culture-to-drive-quality-and-devops-success?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://www.itproportal.com/features/serverless-computing-for-enterprises-start-small-and-think-about-data/]]> Serverless Computing for Enterprises: Start Small and Think About Data Why the goal for IT leaders is to help developers focus their excitement over serverless on the right applications. Read Now <[[https://www.itproportal.com/features/serverless-computing-for-enterprises-start-small-and-think-about-data/]]> <https://thenewstack.io/steeltoe-modernize-net-apps-for-a-microservices-architecture/> Modernize .NET Apps for a Microservices Architecture Why Steeltoe is .NET for the modern age. Take a Closer Look <[[https://thenewstack.io/steeltoe-modernize-net-apps-for-a-microservices-architecture/]]> Upcoming Events 01/28-01/30, Dynatrace Perform, Las Vegas <[[https://www.dynatrace.com/perform/]]>
01/29, Securing Microservices with Spring and Pivotal Cloud Foundry, Webinar, EMEA <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/jan-29-securing-microservices-spring-and-pivotal-cloud-foundry-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
